name: src/Emitter.js
Emitter
description: a simple event emitter

name: suppressEvents
description: whether to suppress all events on this emitter

name: getEventMap
description: returns the Map that is used to store events for emitters

name: createEventMap
description: creates a new Map for the emitter

name: removeEventMap
description: creates a new Map for the emitter

name: eventMap
description: returns the Map used to store events

name: on
description: listens for an event of this emitter

params.name: listener
params.description: the function to be called when the event fires

params.name: context
params.description: the context to run the function under

params.name: isStatic
params.description: whether this listener can be removed without force

params.name: times
params.description: the times this listener can be called before it removes it self

name: once
description: binds a listener that removes its self once the event is fired

params.name: context
params.description: the context to run the functions under

params.name: isStatic
params.description: whether this listener can be removed without using force

name: off
description: removes a listener

params.name: listener
params.description: this has to be the exact function that was bound

params.name: context
params.description: this has to be the exact context that was bound with the listener

params.name: force
params.description: whether to force remove the listeners

name: emit
description: fires ad event on this emitter

params.name: args
params.description: the arguments to be passed to the listeners. these will be ignored if an Event was passed in

name: clear
description:
removes all events of "eventType"
NOTE: passing no arguments will clean all listeners
NOTE: passing a single boolean will clear all listens and act as the force flag

params.name: force
params.description: whether to force remove the listeners

params.name: useRegExp
params.description: whether to use the RegExp to test other types

name: count
description: returns the number of listeners bound to the event

params.name: useRegExp
params.description: whether to use the RegExp to test other types

name: dispose
description: cleans up the emitter for GC

name: src/Event.js

params.name: type
params.description: the type of event, this can be anything, but its a good idea just to make it a string

params.name: target
params.description: the emitter that is firing this event

params.name: args
params.description: an array of arguments that is used on the listener functions

name: type
description: the type of event

name: args
description: an array of arguments that are used when calling the listener function

name: target
description: a reference to the emitter that fired the event

name: src/index.js
src/utils.js
./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "regexp-events",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "A simple RegExp event emitter",
  "main": "dist/regexp-events.js",
  "browser": "dist/regexp-events.umd.js",
  "module": "dist/regexp-events.es.js",
  "scripts": {
    "precommit": "pretty-quick --staged",
    "commitmsg": "commitlint -e $GIT_PARAMS",
    "commit": "commit",
    "prepublishOnly": "npm run build",
    "clean": "rimraf dist",
    "prebuild": "npm run clean",
    "build": "npm-run-all --parallel build:**:*",
    "build:src": "rollup -c config/rollup.config.js",
    "build:min": "rollup -c config/rollup.min.config.js",
    "build:es": "rollup -c config/rollup.es.config.js",
    "build:es:min": "rollup -c config/rollup.es.min.config.js",
    "build:umd": "rollup -c config/rollup.umd.config.js",
    "build:umd:min": "rollup -c config/rollup.umd.min.config.js",
    "clean:test": "rimraf coverage",
    "pretest": "npm run clean:test",
    "test": "npm-run-all --parallel test:karma test:node",
    "test:karma": "karma start karma.config.js",
    "test:node": "mocha --compilers js:babel-core/register --R spec test/node.js",
    "test:debug": "karma start karma.config.js --browsers Chrome --no-single-run",
    "format": "prettier --write ./**/*.{js,json,css,md}",
    "predocs": "rimraf docs",
    "docs": "esdoc"
  },
  "keywords": [
    "events",
    "emitter",
    "regexp"
  ],
  "directories": {
    "test": "./test/",
    "lib": "./src/"
  },
  "repository": "https://github.com/rdfriedl/regexp-events",
  "author": "rdfriedl",
  "license": "MIT",
  "devDependencies": {
    "@commitlint/cli": "^6.1.0",
    "@commitlint/config-conventional": "^6.1.0",
    "@commitlint/prompt-cli": "^6.1.0",
    "babel-core": "^6.26.0",
    "babel-plugin-external-helpers": "^6.22.0",
    "babel-plugin-istanbul": "^4.1.4",
    "babel-polyfill": "^6.23.0",
    "babel-preset-env": "^1.6.1",
    "babel-preset-es2015-rollup": "^3.0.0",
    "chai": "^4.1.0",
    "core-js": "^2.5.3",
    "esdoc": "^1.0.4",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "husky": "^0.14.3",
    "karma": "^2.0.0",
    "karma-chrome-launcher": "^2.2.0",
    "karma-coverage": "^1.1.1",
    "karma-coverage-html-index-reporter": "^1.0.2",
    "karma-firefox-launcher": "^1.0.1",
    "karma-mocha": "^1.3.0",
    "karma-mocha-reporter": "^2.2.3",
    "karma-phantomjs-launcher": "^1.0.4",
    "karma-rollup-plugin": "^0.2.4",
    "karma-sinon-chai": "^1.3.1",
    "karma-source-map-support": "^1.2.0",
    "mocha": "^3.4.2",
    "npm-run-all": "^4.0.2",
    "prettier": "^1.10.2",
    "pretty-quick": "^1.4.1",
    "rimraf": "^2.6.1",
    "rollup": "^0.44.0",
    "rollup-plugin-babel": "^2.7.1",
    "rollup-plugin-commonjs": "^8.0.2",
    "rollup-plugin-node-resolve": "^3.0.0",
    "rollup-plugin-uglify": "^2.0.1",
    "sinon": "^2.3.8",
    "sinon-chai": "^2.11.0",
    "uglify-es": "^3.0.24"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "lodash.isfunction": "^3.0.8",
    "lodash.isregexp": "^4.0.1",
    "lodash.isstring": "^4.0.1"
  },
  "prettier": {
    "useTabs": true,
    "semi": true,
    "trailingComma": "all",
    "printWidth": 120
  }
}
